submit_description1: Here is where you show how you are keeping our world clean and get some cRECYS.
submit_description2: Remember to fill the form with care. We are a reputation based system.
type_of_residues: WHAT KINDS OF WASTE ARE YOU REPORTING TODAY?
helper_invoice: Upload below the official invoice that specifies the type and amount of waste you are recycling. PDF or PNG only
upload_video: UPLOAD A VIDEO REPRESENTING THE AMOUNT OF WASTE
helper_video: Now record a video of the volume collected in a manner we can see the weight display of the scale. Make sure the video catches the whole uncovered volume and not only part of it. Please say the correct amount while filming so our validator can listen it.
done_message: In case you've uploaded a video, we'll be validating this form soon.
